EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-11-Alyce-Follow-Up-1.Prospect Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Your Gift from Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Last week I sent you a gift in the hope of speaking with you about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization. Just in case you didn't receive the box, you can select or exchange your gift by clicking below.
<[[{{lead.VMTurbo SaaS Activation URL}}]]>
I am hoping to grab 20 minutes on your calendar to get your feedback. We help customers like you enhance workload efficiency and performance on your way to automating IT with confidence.
Thank you so much. Until we speak, please enjoy your gift!
Sincerely,
Catherine
